entities.name: MICROSOFT
entities.description: Provider of cloud-based services and various software products including Azure, Microsoft 365, Office, Bing, SQL Server, Windows Server, Office 365, Xbox, LinkedIn, and more. Engages in software development, infrastructure building, and product innovation.

entities.name: AZURE
entities.description: Microsoft's cloud computing service that supports various applications including IoT solutions like Azure Stack, Azure IoT Edge, and Azure Sphere.

entities.name: WINDOWS
entities.description: Microsoft's operating system ecosystem which is evolving to support cloud-based services and the Internet of Things.

entities.name: MICROSOFT 365
entities.description: A suite of productivity services provided by Microsoft as part of their cloud-based offerings.

entities.name: OFFICE
entities.description: Microsoft's suite of productivity software which includes popular applications like Word, Excel, and PowerPoint.

entities.name: OFFICE 365
entities.description: Microsoft's subscription-based service offering Office applications and other productivity services.

entities.name: IOT
entities.description: Internet of Things; a system of interrelated computing devices, mechanical and digital machines provided by Microsoft through Azure IoT solutions.

relationships.relationship_description: Azure is a cloud computing service provided by Microsoft
Windows is an operating system developed by Microsoft
Microsoft 365 is a suite of productivity services provided by Microsoft
Office is a suite of productivity software provided by Microsoft
Bing is a web search engine provided by Microsoft
SQL Server is a relational database management system provided by Microsoft
Windows Server is a server operating system provided by Microsoft
Office 365 is a subscription-based service offering Office applications and other productivity services provided by Microsoft
Xbox is a gaming console brand owned by Microsoft
LinkedIn is a professional networking platform owned by Microsoft
HoloLens is a mixed reality smartglasses product developed by Microsoft
IoT (Internet of Things) solutions are provided by Microsoft through Azure IoT services
